component.name: NVIDIA Linux Graphics Driver (LTS Kernel)
component.summary: Accelerated Linux Graphics Driver for the -lts kernel

description.p: The NVIDIA Accelerated Linux Graphics Driver brings accelerated 2D functionality and high-performance OpenGL and Vulkan support to Linux with the use of NVIDIA graphics processing units.

These drivers provide optimized hardware acceleration for OpenGL, X, and, Vulkan applications and support nearly all recent NVIDIA GPU products. The NVIDIA graphics driver uses a Unified Driver Architecture: the single graphics driver supports all modern NVIDIA GPUs.
